page.title: 12Sargents Ice Cream
page.content: We visited Sargents factory located on Brigg road, the main through route to Brigg.This is a family company started by Mr Sargents father in 1936 on this site because it was simply the only one available.Originally the cost was Â£2000 ,garages were added later. Present day problems with this site are the high rates compared with the industrial estate in Brigg, and the distance from centres of population. The main enterprise is the production and sales of dairy ice-cream. The business is seasonal,most of the sales taking place in the summer.The labour force changes from 3 full time and 7 part-time to 2 full and 2 part-time. The majority of the workers come from outside the village from Scunthorpe, Brigg,Scawby,Messingham and Bonby. The company is dependant on raw materials from outside the village.
